posts.post_content:
I have the following T206 Southern Leaguers, all with Old Mill backs for sale.  

Cad ColesSGC3.5 $SOLD
Charlie FritzSGC3 $SOLD
J. Ross HelmSGC3+ $SOLD
Frank KingSGC3.5 $SOLD
Sid SmithSGC3 $SOLD
Woodie Thornton SGC5 $1,000.00 
James WestlakeSGC3 $SOLD

All prices include shipping.

I recently acquired a lot of 500 graded T206 cards and I've upgraded my PC to all 4 or better.  I'm selling my duplicates here and on the FB T206 group over the next few days. I have over 150 graded T206 cards available. I'll be listing them here, but email me at [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] if you'd like a list.

If you want to purchase any cards:
1. The first person to post a full price offer on this thread will get the card.
2. Email me at [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] and let me know which card(s) you want.
3. Remit payment by PayPal - FF.
4. Cards will be shipped within 2 business days.
